settings.text:
WE ARE YOUR STRATEGIC COMPASS
Life Sciences founders are scientists and visionaries, not procurement specialists. We bridge the gap between groundbreaking science and commercial execution, de-risking your most critical operational challenges.

Our Flagship Service

The CDMO Navigator: A high-impact engagement to secure the right manufacturing partner, saving you months of delay and hundreds of thousands of dollars. We Deliver:

  • A Vetted Short-List: 3-5 CDMOs perfectly matched to your molecule, stage, and volume.
  • Strategic SWOT Analysis: A deep dive into the strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats of each vendor.
  • Negotiation Intel & Contract Review: Key terms to demand and clauses to avoid.\
  • Direct Liaison Support. We act as your representative in initial vendor communications.


Stop letting vendor selection burn your cash and timeline. Contact our advisory team at advisory@zelarisgroup.com.

Business Development & Partnership Strategy.

Operational Road-mapping.
